textBox.richText: On April 25 Aaron and I drove down to Green River to meet Mark Noble & Path Thompson from Huntsville, Alabama, Mike Olsen from Atlanta, and Matt Blank and Steve Neal from Utah for 6 days of riding in the San Rafael Swell, Moab, and southeastern Utah. Click on each link below to see pictures & videos for each day. Day 1: San Rafael Swell & Colored Trails UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Day 2: Dead Cow, White Wash, etc. UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Day 3: Kane Creek, Behind the Rocks, Pritchett Canyon UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Day 4: Hell’s Revenge & Slickrock, Top of the World & Onion Creek UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Day 5: Hole in the Rock UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Day 6: Arch Canyon The map below shows our GPS tracks for each day. You can zoom, pan, change map type, etc. to take a closer look. In the upper right hand corner is a legend/navigation box for each day’s ride(s). The dates are denoted in YYMMDD format.
